app.name: Smart iFrame
app.short_description: Easily embed other websites, with dynamic URLs.
app.long_description:
Add an iFrame to bring other websites into the agent workspace.
Use template strings like {ticket_id} to create dynamic URLs.
app.installation_instructions: Simply specify the URL to embed and install!

url.label: URL
url.helpText: The URL of the site to iFrame. Include template strings like {ticket_id} or {current_user_email} to make the URL dynamic.

height.label: Height
height.helpText: The fixed height of the iFrame window. Default 300px.
